name: Max Power and the Egyptian Beetle Case
name_original: Max Power and the Egyptian Beetle Case
description:
En español.

The Game

Max Power is a supreme detective; with the deductive powers of Sherlock Holmes and Mike Hammer's fists of steel, he's dedicated to keep the universe balanced by finding missing things or people. Even missing cats!

Help him in this point and click adventure to solve the case of a burglary committed by his nemesis, SHADOWGIRL. You will have to explore several scenarios in the city, perform tasks, complete mini-games and use certain objects to achieve the objective.

Credits
  • Writing, artwork, design and coding: Mario Matalla.
  • Music arranged and produced by Mario Matalla with Audiotool loops created by Opposite perception, Fry, Ingenesis, digigeist, Grey, Dove, Suprakick, Harvey Summers, uifdowp9, volo, dancemachine, Soulful House and Loopmasters.
  • Image distortion effect by Daniel Westfall.
  • Icons based on material from game-icons.net created by Delapouite, Lorc and Skoll.
  • Komika Title is a freeware font from Vigilante Typeface Corporation. Courier Prime is a font by Alan Dague-Greene. Xanh Mono is a font from Yellow Type, Lam Bao and Duy Dao.
  • Beta testers: Undeadmaiden, Xavimat, Ertal.
  • Illustrations made with Muvizu.
